synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: L-methionine methyl ester hydrochloride (12.0 g, 60.0 mmol), triethylamine (16.7 mL, 120.0 mmol), oxalyl chloride (2.58 mL, 30.0 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.solvents: dichloromethane (200 mL for reaction, 200 mL for oxalyl chloride solution)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed three times with water (3x50 mL)

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: H2Me2-(S,S)-methox (11.343 g, 30 mmol), Me4NOH (25% methanolic solution, 36 mL, 125 mmol), CuCl2 (8.07 g, 60 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.solvents: water (75 mL for H2Me2-(S,S)-methox solution, 25 mL for CuCl2 solution)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: filtered off and dried under vacuum

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Crystals of 1 (5.0 mg), 0.02 M H2O/CH3OH (1:1) solutions of AuCl3 and AuCl
synthesis_conditions.time: 60 min for AuIII@1, 180 min for AuI@1
